pageContext.claim: “Pfizer and Novartis and a lot of the big companies agreed to reduce their prices after I cut. I called them up and they were great. They were great. They reduced their prices! Did you ever hear what president calls a drug company, 'I'd like you to reduce your prices.' You think Hillary would do that?”
pageContext.analysis: Pfizer did agree to a brief pause but then announced it would raise prices on 41 prescription drugs as planned at the start of 2019. It did not reduce prices.
